channel.title: Npwt on Wojciech Francuzik
channel.description: Recent content in Npwt on Wojciech Francuzik

item.title: NPWT
item.description: My work on Negative Pressure Wound Therapy use in Dermatology started in 2014. I first descibed a case report where NPWT was used after surgical procedure in a patient with acne inversa. Then, I was intersted in following up on how to cut costs of NPWT in hospital setting to make this techniqe more easily availible. This reaseach is ongoing and I will share more details in the future.
